body_html: This error happens when the cudnn-xxx.tgz package is used and libcudnn is installed under /usr/local/cuda. When a deb package is used (tested on Ubuntu 16.04), cmake shows a warning that libraries could be overwritten and in fact uses the conda version of libcudnn (v7). I'm looking into fixing this now.
